meanings.definition: A tool used for cleaning teeth.
meanings.sent1: I keep my toothbrushes in a cup in the bathroom.
meanings.sent2: The store sells different types of toothbrushes.
meanings.sent3: My toothbrushes had a party in the toothpaste jar!
meanings.sent4: Her collection of toothbrushes was like a colorful garden in the bathroom.
meanings.sent5: The toothbrushes danced around happily in the toothbrush holder.

meanings.sent1: She bought two toothbrushes for her trip.
meanings.sent2: The dentist recommended changing toothbrushes every three months.
meanings.sent3: The toothbrushes in the bathroom cabinet whispered secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: The toothbrushes on the store shelf stood like soldiers in a row.
meanings.sent5: The colorful toothbrushes brightened up the dull bathroom.
